languages.text: "Коль столь сильно ты печешься об элантах, так почему же следуешь за {mf|ним|ней}, а не бросишься в пропасть? Ты — червоточина, в которой зияет пасть Сай'лантреш. Не говори мне об опасностях, мон-кай, не ведающий и десятой доли о том, с чем играет сам!"

"If you truly cared for the elantach, you wouldn't be following {mf|him|her}, you would have thrown yourself into the abyss long ago. You are a canker, and the jaws of Sai'lanthresh yawn wide within you. Don't talk to me about dangers, you, a mon-keigh who has no notion of what he is playing with!"
languages.original_text: "Коль столь сильно ты печешься об элантах, так почему же следуешь за {mf|ним|ней}, а не бросишься в пропасть? Ты — червоточина, в которой зияет пасть Сай'лантреш. Не говори мне об опасностях, мон-кай, не ведающий и десятой доли о том, с чем играет сам!"

traits.locale_text: "If you truly cared for the el'antar, you wouldn't be following {mf|him|her}, you would have thrown yourself into the abyss long ago. You are a canker, and the jaws of Sai'lanthresh yawn wide within you. Don't talk to me about dangers, you, a mon-keigh who has no notion of what he is playing with!"

"If you truly cared for the el'antar, you wouldn't be following {mf|him|her}, you would have thrown yourself into the abyss long ago. You are a canker, and the jaws of Sai'lanthresh yawn wide within you. Don't talk to me about dangers, you, a mon-keigh who has no notion of what he is playing with!"

"If you truly cared for the elantach, you wouldn't be following {mf|him|her}, you would have thrown yourself into the abyss long ago. You are a canker, and the jaws of Sai'lanthresh yawn wide within you. Don't talk to me about dangers, you, a mon-keigh who has no notion of what he is playing with!"

languages.text: “如果你真的在乎这个外界人，你就不会继续跟在{mf|他|她}身边，而是早就把你自己丢进深渊里了。你就是一块溃疡，赛·兰斯雷什的巨口在你灵魂深处打着呵欠。别和我谈什么危险，你这只猴子根本不明白你在玩弄着什么样的力量！”
languages.original_text: "If you truly cared for the elantach, you wouldn't be following {mf|him|her}, you would have thrown yourself into the abyss long ago. You are a canker, and the jaws of Sai'lanthresh yawn wide within you. Don't talk to me about dangers, you, a mon-keigh who has no notion of what he is playing with!"

traits.locale_text: “如果你真的在乎这个外界人，你就不会继续跟在{mf|他|她}身边，而是早就把你自己丢进深渊里了。你就是一块溃疡，赛·兰斯雷什的巨口在你灵魂深处打着呵欠。别和我谈什么危险，你这只猴子根本不明白你在玩弄着什么样的力量！”

languages.text: «Si de verdad te preocuparas por {mf|el|la} elantach, en lugar de seguir{mf|le|la}, te habrías lanzado al abismo hace mucho. Eres un cáncer y las fauces de Sai'lanthresh se abren en tu interior. No me hables de peligros: ¡eres un mon-keigh que no comprende las fuerzas con las que juega!».
languages.original_text: "If you truly cared for the elantach, you wouldn't be following {mf|him|her}, you would have thrown yourself into the abyss long ago. You are a canker, and the jaws of Sai'lanthresh yawn wide within you. Don't talk to me about dangers, you, a mon-keigh who has no notion of what he is playing with!"

traits.locale_text: «Si de verdad te preocuparas por {mf|el|la} elantach, en lugar de seguir{mf|le|la}, te habrías lanzado al abismo hace mucho. Eres un cáncer y las fauces de Sai'lanthresh se abren en tu interior. No me hables de peligros: ¡eres un mon-keigh que no comprende las fuerzas con las que juega!».

languages.text: 「エランタを本気で心配しているのなら、{mf|彼|彼女}に従うことなく、はるか昔に己の身を奈落の底に投げていただろう。お前は悪だ、セランスレッシュがその内側で大きく顎を開けている。我の前で危険性を説くのは止めてもらいたい。自分の行いに考えが至らないとは、モン＝ケイらしいな！」
languages.original_text: "If you truly cared for the elantach, you wouldn't be following {mf|him|her}, you would have thrown yourself into the abyss long ago. You are a canker, and the jaws of Sai'lanthresh yawn wide within you. Don't talk to me about dangers, you, a mon-keigh who has no notion of what he is playing with!"

traits.locale_text: 「エランタを本気で心配しているのなら、{mf|彼|彼女}に従うことなく、はるか昔に己の身を奈落の底に投げていただろう。お前は悪だ、セランスレッシュがその内側で大きく顎を開けている。我の前で危険性を説くのは止めてもらいたい。自分の行いに考えが至らないとは、モン＝ケイらしいな！」

languages.text: "Wäre Euch wirklich {mf|am|an der} Elantach gelegen, würdet Ihr {mf|ihm|ihr} nicht folgen, sondern hättet Euch längst selbst in den Abgrund gestürzt. Ihr seid ein Geschwür, und Sai'lanthreshs Schlund ist in Euch weit geöffnet und gähnt. Redet mir nicht von Gefahren, Ihr seid ein Chem-Pan-Sey, der keine Ahnung hat, womit er spielt!"
languages.original_text: "If you truly cared for the elantach, you wouldn't be following {mf|him|her}, you would have thrown yourself into the abyss long ago. You are a canker, and the jaws of Sai'lanthresh yawn wide within you. Don't talk to me about dangers, you, a mon-keigh who has no notion of what he is playing with!"

traits.locale_text: "Wäre Euch wirklich {mf|am|an der} Elantach gelegen, würdet Ihr {mf|ihm|ihr} nicht folgen, sondern hättet Euch längst selbst in den Abgrund gestürzt. Ihr seid ein Geschwür, und Sai'lanthreshs Schlund ist in Euch weit geöffnet und gähnt. Redet mir nicht von Gefahren, Ihr seid ein Chem-Pan-Sey, der keine Ahnung hat, womit er spielt!"

languages.text: « Si la sécurité de l'elantach vous préoccupait réellement, vous vous seriez jeté dans l'abîme il y a bien longtemps au lieu de l'accompagner. Vous êtes une porte ouverte sur les mâchoires béantes de Sai'lanthresh. Ne venez pas me parler de danger alors que vous jouez avec des pouvoirs qui vous dépassent totalement ! »
languages.original_text: "If you truly cared for the elantach, you wouldn't be following {mf|him|her}, you would have thrown yourself into the abyss long ago. You are a canker, and the jaws of Sai'lanthresh yawn wide within you. Don't talk to me about dangers, you, a mon-keigh who has no notion of what he is playing with!"

traits.locale_text: « Si la sécurité de l'elantach vous préoccupait réellement, vous vous seriez jeté dans l'abîme il y a bien longtemps au lieu de l'accompagner. Vous êtes une porte ouverte sur les mâchoires béantes de Sai'lanthresh. Ne venez pas me parler de danger alors que vous jouez avec des pouvoirs qui vous dépassent totalement ! »

languages.text: "Eğer elantach'ı gerçekten önemsiyor olsaydın onu takip etmez, kendini çok uzun zaman önce uçurumdan atardın. Yozluk yayan bir varlıksın, Sai'lanthresh'in dilini konuşuyorsun. Bana tehlikelerden söz etme, senin gibi bir mon-keigh neyle uğraştığının farkında bile olamaz!"
languages.original_text: "If you truly cared for the elantach, you wouldn't be following {mf|him|her}, you would have thrown yourself into the abyss long ago. You are a canker, and the jaws of Sai'lanthresh yawn wide within you. Don't talk to me about dangers, you, a mon-keigh who has no notion of what he is playing with!"

traits.locale_text: "Eğer elantach'ı gerçekten önemsiyor olsaydın onu takip etmez, kendini çok uzun zaman önce uçurumdan atardın. Yozluk yayan bir varlıksın, Sai'lanthresh'in dilini konuşuyorsun. Bana tehlikelerden söz etme, senin gibi bir mon-keigh neyle uğraştığının farkında bile olamaz!"
